body: For someone who speaks Mandarin, this is seriously messed up. Firstly, she tries to go back, and in the middle of that, an emergency fire exercise starts and everyone sees her naked, including the younger years of the school (which I would assume are elementary students since they look young). And because she walked around naked, the teacher forced her to stand in front all the students of the school for public humiliation. (This is just a vague summery, so this doesn't really cover every single thing in this manga, still worth waiting for the English translation though)
